DatabaseManager

Class Sql

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseManager.Sql

  • public class Sql
extends Object
    This class is used to perform all SQL functions. This class uses some of the interfaces from java.sql
    Since:
    2017-11-18
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Santhosh
    See Also:
    java.sql
